name: Dailies Inc.
description: Developer of an educational platform designed to help children make progress. The company's platform engages students with fun educational experiences and shares the results with parents and educators for maximum educational success, providing powerful virtual lessons by world-class educators, while the app engages students through gamified micro-lessons, enabling parents to assist their kids when they need it most.
one_liner: Developer of an educational platform designed to help children make progress. The company's platform engages students with fun educational experiences and shares the results with parents and educators for maximum educational success, providing powerful virtual lessons by world-class educators, while the app engages students through gamified micro-lessons, enabling parents to assist their kids when they need it most.
